feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
